Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Of the 407 Yellow Card records analysed , 106 satisfied criteria for TDF - related kidney disease , of which 53 ( 50 % ) had features of kidney tubular dysfunction , 35 ( 33 % ) were found to have features of glomerular dysfunction and 18 ( 17 % ) had Fanconi syndrome .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease          |
|------------------|
| TDF-related kidney disease |
| Kidney tubular dysfunction |
| Glomerular dysfunction |
| Fanconi syndrome |

Note: TDF-related kidney disease is the overarching disease entity, and kidney tubular dysfunction, glomerular dysfunction, and Fanconi syndrome are specific types of kidney diseases mentioned in the paragraph.
